text: I replaced before posting here, but the key is there, Iâ€™ve manually introduced it. You can actually see it in the 4th pic

Hey Guys,
Have anyone integrated HubSpot with Mulesoft using restAPI call? If yes, please let me know.

So on an external webpage I show all the emails we have sent to a particular customer, I can see the name and timestamp of those emails from the API call and looking at hs_email_last_email_name, is there a way to get a URL to the actual email inside HubSpot, so that it can be looked at without having to log into HubSpot?
What are you looking for exactly ?
How can I set a custom object property to be of type currency? When I add currency as field type it throws an error that it does not exist

Somebody please correct me if I'm wrong, but I think currency is just a Boolean. It uses the currency that you have set up in your portal the only thing the property does is force the property to use the currency or not
But somebody else would have to test that theory
Hi guys, What is the API to add/edit exclusion rule for a pop-up form ?
<@U02AK2MA29Z> I am first time integrating Mule to HubSpot, so wanted to know how to do the configurations and what will be the REST endpoints by which i can post the data to HubSpot
Hi! Some HTML elements outside the post content are getting to my search results descriptions.. does someone knows a workaround for this problem?

Hmm ok, well based on the most recent <https://HubSpotdev.slack.com/archives/C2YHAHB6K/p1628890411112800?thread_ts=1628762061.097900&cid=C2YHAHB6K|error message> you shared, it does look like an authentication error. Can you verify that the API key is correct (for the correct account too)?
